responses: About 45 years ago, we began our journey of a promising success in building houses and helping build homes. We believe we experience satisfaction in the truest sense only when our customers are happy. Nurturing a legacy of trust for 3 generations now, our promise has met Zero Missed Deadlines. Punctuality is not a lost virtue. We stand testimony to that. Steering clear of debts on our credit, we have built a Zero-Debt Company, Ahad has delivered a whopping 226 projects to about 6,480 customers. Homes raise and age families through different time spans.
AhadExcellencia is a Spanish themed project of 1, 2 & 3 bedroom homes located off Sarjapur Road., Bengaluru. Here are some options to help you navigate

You only live once. So live well! It is said that the difference between the ordinary and the extraordinary is that little extra. AhadExcellencia is a project that reflects this difference. Everything here transforms from the average into the magnificent, all because we believe that you deserve more
– more space, more convenience, more style and not to forget, more of life’s little joys.

Ahad city brings you the comfort with luxury of nature in 3BHK Villas with a private garden area for the relaxed weekends. These are a duplex villas with a grand terrace all by yourself keeping your lives larger. Serenity is a bliss and Ahad City aspires to present you the very same. See video - here

Imagine a weekend amid lush green by a flowing stream of water. Built on 39+ acres (Phase 1), Ahad City gives you just that forever Aiming to provide a serene living area, the project offers premium Villa Plots/Villas, away from the city chaos. With spri different flora and fauna around, this place gives a vibe of a lavish resort. A perfect natural retreat for you!

Ahad city brings you the comfort with luxury of nature for the relaxed weekends, Serenity is a bliss and Ahad City aspires.
- Built on massive 39+ acres area with multiple Parks.
- 30 x 40, 30 x 45, 30 x 50, 40 x 60, 40 x 75 Dimension villa plots available

- Avenue of Trees Lined Up along all roads of the Layout.
- Power saving street lights.

- Rain Water harvesting mechanism.
